name: scrambling-letters
description: A lightweight javascript library for scrambling letters within a piece of text, giving a nice decoding effect.

scripts.styles: node-sass scss -o dist/css & cleancss dist/css/example.css -o dist/css/example.min.css
scripts.bundleJS: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ @babel/preset-env ] ] js/scramble.js -o dist/js/scramble.js & uglifyjs dist/js/scramble.js --output dist/js/scramble.min.js
scripts.localJS: browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ @babel/preset-env ] ] js/example.js -o dist/js/example.js & uglifyjs dist/js/example.js --output dist/js/example.min.js
scripts.build: npm run styles && npm run bundleJS && npm run localJS

author: Chris Snowden <cdsnowden@gmail.com>
